    • 方法详细资料

      • fix

        private static void fix(IndexedSortable s,
                        int pN,
                        int pO,
                        int rN,
                        int rO)
        Fix the records into sorted order, swapping when the first record is greater than the second record.
        参数:
        s - paged sortable
        pN - page number of first record
        pO - page offset of first record
        rN - page number of second record
        rO - page offset of second record

      • getMaxDepth

        protected static int getMaxDepth(int x)
        Deepest recursion before giving up and doing a heapsort. Returns 2 * ceil(log(n)).

      • sort

        public void sort(IndexedSortable s,
                 int p,
                 int r)
        Sort the given range of items using quick sort. Sort the items accessed through the given IndexedSortable over the given range of logical indices. From the perspective of the sort algorithm, each index between l (inclusive) and r (exclusive) is an addressable entry. If the recursion depth falls below getMaxDepth(int), then switch to HeapSort.
        指定者:
        sort 在接口中 IndexedSorter
        另请参阅:
        IndexedSortable.compare(int, int), IndexedSortable.swap(int, int)

      • sort

        public void sort(IndexedSortable s)
        指定者:
        sort 在接口中 IndexedSorter

      • sortInternal

        private static void sortInternal(IndexedSortable s,
                                 int recordsPerSegment,
                                 int recordSize,
                                 int maxOffset,
                                 int p,
                                 int pN,
                                 int pO,
                                 int r,
                                 int rN,
                                 int rO,
                                 int depth)
        Sort the given range of items using quick sort. If the recursion depth falls below getMaxDepth(int), then switch to HeapSort.
        参数:
        s - paged sortable
        recordsPerSegment - number of records per memory segment
        recordSize - number of bytes per record
        maxOffset - offset of a last record in a memory segment
        p - index of first record in range
        pN - page number of first record in range
        pO - page offset of first record in range
        r - index of last-plus-one'th record in range
        rN - page number of last-plus-one'th record in range
        rO - page offset of last-plus-one'th record in range
        depth - recursion depth
        另请参阅:
        sort(IndexedSortable, int, int)
